s0181: I wish you would urgently summon L端 and Xi with benefits; when L端 and Xi arrive, then change and enter Chong'er instead.'
s0182: Duke Mu agreed, sent someone with Pi Zheng to return, summoned L端 and Xi.
s0183: L端, Xi and others suspected Pi Zheng had secrets, so said Yi Wu killed Pi Zheng.
s0184: Pi Zheng's son Pi Bao fled to Qin, persuaded Duke Mu saying: 'The Jin ruler is without the Way, the common people are not close to him, he can be attacked.'
s0185: Duke Mu said: 'If the common people were truly not close, how could they execute their ministers?
s0186: Being able to execute their ministers shows they are in harmony.'
s0187: He did not listen, but secretly employed Bao.
s0188: Twelfth year, Qi's Guan Zhong and Xi Peng died.
s0189: Jin suffered drought, came to request grain.
s0190: Pi Bao persuaded Duke Mu not to give it, to take advantage of their hunger and attack them.
s0191: Duke Mu asked Gong Sun Zhi, Zhi said: 'Famine and abundance alternate, we cannot not give.'
s0192: Duke Mu followed Zhi's advice, gave grain to Jin.
s0193: Thirteenth year, attacked Jin, took Wangguan and Liyang.
s0194: Fourteenth year, attacked Jin, took Wusui.
s0195: Fifteenth year, attacked Jin, took Gaoliang.
s0196: Sixteenth year, attacked Jin, took Jiang.
s0197: Seventeenth year, attacked Jin, took Mao.
s0198: Eighteenth year, attacked Jin, took Fushi.
s0199: Nineteenth year, attacked Jin, took Mao again.
s0200: Twentieth year, attacked Jin, took Pengya.
s0201: Twenty-first year, attacked Jin, took Qin.
s0202: Twenty-second year, attacked Jin, took Jiang again.
s0203: Twenty-third year, attacked Jin, took Linghu.
s0204: Twenty-fourth year, attacked Jin, took Xincheng.
s0205: Twenty-fifth year, attacked Jin, took Hequ.
s0206: Twenty-sixth year, attacked Jin, took Xiayang.
s0207: Twenty-seventh year, attacked Jin, took Jiang again.
s0208: Twenty-eighth year, attacked Jin, took Yu.
s0209: Twenty-ninth year, attacked Jin, took Du.
s0210: Thirtieth year, attacked Jin, took Yuan.
s0211: Thirty-first year, attacked Jin, took Bei.
s0212: Thirty-second year, attacked Jin, took Xun.
s0213: Thirty-third year, attacked Jin, took Jiang again.
s0214: Thirty-fourth year, attacked Jin, took Mao again.
s0215: Thirty-fifth year, attacked Jin, took Xincheng again.
s0216: Thirty-sixth year, attacked Jin, took Hequ again.
s0217: Thirty-seventh year, attacked Jin, took Xiayang again.
s0218: Thirty-eighth year, attacked Jin, took Yu again.
s0219: Thirty-ninth year, Duke Mu died, his son Duke Kang ascended.
s0220: Duke Kang of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.
s0240: Twenty-first year, Duke Kang died, his son Duke Gong ascended.
